downloadTitle: 3D-printable mouse tail designs for Microsoft Adaptive Mouse
downloadDescription: Download 3D designs to further customize the Microsoft Adaptive Mouse tail.

downloadFile.name: 3D-printable mouse tail designs for Microsoft Adaptive Mouse.zip
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7c1fca7a-8b3d-4a5a-9d05-2ced3f3146c4/3D-printable mouse tail designs for Microsoft Adaptive Mouse.zip

detailsSection:
You can download individual designs or all available designs for Microsoft Adaptive Mouse tails. To ensure you select the correct size and design, please carefully review the file names (e.g., Flat_Mouse_Tail_WithSlope_012023_small).

3D-printable designs from Microsoft do not include or require a permanent change to or opening an accessory; such actions will void the accessory's warranty. Microsoft does not guarantee that these 3D-printable designs will work for everyone. Use these 3D-printable designs at your own risk. Microsoft is not responsible for any damage resulting from the use of these 3D-printable designs.

3D printing services are provided and warrantied exclusively by the service provider. Microsoft is not responsible for the performance of any third-party service providers, or their compliance with applicable regulatory, compliance, safety or any other requirements.
detailsSection_file_name: 3D-printable mouse tail designs for Microsoft Adaptive Mouse.zip
installInstructionSection:
1. Select Download, select the file or files you want to download, and then select Download again.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
